ConnectionServer.StringSource: DATA SOURCE=192.168.5.251\SQLEXPRESS,1433; INITIAL CATALOG=LOJA; USER ID=SA; PASSWORD=ERPM; Integrated Security=False
ConnectionServer.StringDestination: DATA SOURCE=drogaleste.procfit.com.br; INITIAL CATALOG=PBS_DROGALESTE_DADOS; USER ID=drogaleste.junior; PASSWORD=Ti873562;

Query: SELECT A.ROMANEIO_CAIXA AS ROMANEIO_CAIXA, A.LOJA AS LOJA, CONVERT(DATE, A.MOVIMENTO) AS MOVIMENTO, FORMAT(A.DATA_HORA, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS DATA_HORA, A.INTEGRADO AS INTEGRADO FROM ROMANEIOS_CAIXAS A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND A.MOVIMENTO = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) AND (A.INTEGRADO <> 'S' OR A.INTEGRADO IS NULL) AND A.LOJA = 5
